roles.name: Super User
roles.description: System Administrator. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.

roles.name: Reindexing Role
roles.description: Role for reindexing for encrypted data access

roles.name: MDMS ADMIN
roles.description: MDMS User that can create and search schema

roles.name: Complaint Assessor
roles.description: One who will assess & assign complaints

roles.name: Report Viewer
roles.description: One who will view the reports of tickets

roles.name: Complaint facilitator 1
roles.description: Person responsible to facilitate the complaint at level one

roles.name: Complaint facilitator 2
roles.description: Person responsible to facilitate the complaint at level two

roles.name: State POC
roles.description: State Point of Contact for escalation management

roles.name: Central POC
roles.description: Central Point of Contact for escalation management

roles.name: Central ONM Project Manager
roles.description: Central Operations and Maintenance Project Manager

roles.name: Central Operation Lead
roles.description: Central Operations Lead for escalation management
